name: Frogger 2 Remake
description:
A full-blown fan remake of the Game Boy Color version of Frogger 2, built for PC, Android, and HTML5! You can play right in your browser, or you can download the game and play offline!

Play as Frogger or Lillie Frog as they conquer 32 stages to rescue the missing frog children. You can play in a variety of different ways, including with another player via local co-op, or by selecting between three different music choices (Original, Arcade, and GB Mix - which consists of a selection of tunes from certain other Game Boy titles). You can use the keyboard, a controller, or play with swipe or tap controls!

There are three downloadable versions of the game:

The GM8 and GMS builds are for PC.

GM8 - Compiled with Game Maker 8

GMS - Compiled with Game Maker Studio

If one of the above doesn't work well, try the other!

Also included is an Apk, for playing the game on Android devices!

CONTROLS:

-Player 1-

Arrow keys, WASD (single player only), Controller 1 - Move

-Player 2-

WASD, Controller 2 - Move

-Both players-

Enter, Escape, and Controller buttons - Talk to Tarius, the elderly frog. If you are playing on mobile, go to Tarius and then tap him to talk to him. These buttons are also used to access the pause menu.

To navigate the menu, you can use either the arrows, WASD, or the mouse. You can press Enter, Escape, or buttons on your controller to confirm your selections or go to the next screen after beating a level.
